rules_text:
Whenever an instant or sorcery card would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead. Whenever a card is exiled this way, draw a card.
Elicit Instant {3}{G} [i](You may cast this as an Instant instead of as an Instant Creature for {3}{G}, putting it into the graveyard as it resolves.)[/i]
